name: AVLCX Custom Woolie Boolie Socks from Defeet
description: Asheville Cyclocross is proud to present our new 2013 custom socks!  Woolie Boolie 6" hi-top socks made down the road in Western North Carolina by the fine folks at Defeet.  These things are super bad a** with the our owl logo on the front and AVLCX on the back.  And at a killer price for an awesome sock they will not last, so get yours today!

name: AVLCX Klean Kanteen Steel Pint Cup
description: We love local product, but when we cannot source it locally we will always try to offer the highest quality USA made product we can find.  That being said, here's our new limited stainless pint cup for 2013.  These things rock.  Only 10 more in stock (as of December 2nd) so order fast before they are gone.  And remember, the more you buy, the more we give back to our amazing community.
